# Tender Announcement: Financial Audit, Tax Specialists – Multiple Audit Entities

## Title and Reference

* Title: **Financial Audit, Tax Specialists – Multiple Audit Entities**
* Reference Number: **cb-928-71467288**

## Tender Information

* Tender Closing Date: **21 November 2023, 14:00:00** (Pacific Time)
* Amendment Number: **5**

## Tender Overview

The Office of the Auditor General of Canada is conducting annual audits of the consolidated financial statements of four key entities: Royal Canadian Mint, VIA Rail Canada Inc., Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, and Freshwater Fish Marketing Corporation. To support these efforts, the OAG requires a tax specialist or a team of specialists to assist the audit teams in examining the tax section of the financial statements.

## Tender Scope

* Seasonal or permanent audit assignment for a term of up to one year
*  Multiple roles may be filled with a team of four to six tax specialists
* Requirements vary depending on the entity being audited
* Compliance with applicable tax laws and industry standards is necessary
* Assignment may be subject to extension based on performance and need

## Regions and Locations

* Audit teams may be based in Ottawa, other locations in the National Capital Region (NCR), or at the audited entities' head offices

# Requirements

* Bidders may submit a proposal to satisfy the OAG's requirements for one, some, or all of the audits described
* Tax specialists or teams must demonstrate technical expertise and analytical skills
* Bidders must provide information on past experience and expertise
* Vendors may submit additional relevant information and supporting documentation
* Proposals must adhere to the format specified in the Approved RFP Package

## Evaluation and Award

* The Office of the Auditor General will evaluate proposals based on:
	+ Technical Merit (typically consisting of the bidder's experience, relevant expertise, and past successes)
	+ Price or Fair Market Value
